name: Tomb Raider - Hu
text: If you control a "Raiding Tool" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned while you control a "Tomb Raider" monster equipped with a "Raiding Tool" card: Target 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Tomb Raider - Hu" once per turn.
